Codemixed_Question: Mujhe early may mein root canal hua tha. Root canal se pehle meri symptoms thi ki meri left ear mein hollow feeling hai aur jaw mein tingling hai. Unhone Claritin D recommend kiya. Mein ise le rahi hoon, lekin swelling usse ya ibuprofen se kam nahi hui hai. Dentist ne bhi mere muh ko check kiya aur kaha ki meri daant theek lagti hai. Namaste doctor, 
Haal hi mein maine ek open lymph node biopsy ke saath lymph node extraction karwaya hai. Mere A and E mein neck ka ultrasound hua hai aur chot mein koi hematoma ya fluid nahi hai. Codemixed_Question: Meri maa pichle 2 saal se hemodialysis par hai. Lagatar feature ye raha hai ki uski hemoglobin levels erythropoietin injections ke baad bhi 7 mg/dl se jyada nahi gayi hai. Feb 2012 mein use chill aur fever hua aur sudden abdominal pain aur distension hui - shuru me peritonitis samjha gaya lekin baad me diagnosed hua as rectus sheath hematoma; last 3 weeks me use sudden pancytopenia hui hai aur platelets 0000 tak drop hui; use 2 units of blood transfuse ki gayi; hematocrit ka kuch reversal hua hai; heparin bandh kar diya gaya hai; use ek hematologist se milaya gaya hai aur bone marrow biopsy ho gayi hai; abhi test results ka wait kar rahi hai; last one week se use alternating fever, chills aur weakness hai (blood culture results ka wait kar rahi hai to check for post biopsy infection) aur excessive++ night sweats bhi hai, mostly dialysis ke baad. Mai ye soch rahi hoon uski sudden blood values ki kami ka reason kya ho sakta hai, leg ki persistent problem ka reason kya hai (not classical pitting; dialysis ke saath jyada change nahi hui hai; nephrologist allergic ya chronic hone ke baare me sure nahi hai) aur night sweats ka reason kya hai. Codemixed_Question:
Itchy rash , first thought it was bug bites since we had gone camping in NY. Appeared on legs and arms first, starts as red raised spot (liek bite) but when you scratch it, more reddish bumps appear, sometimes intensely itchy, more at night, keeps me from sleeping. Itchy rash, pehle toh laga ki yeh khatmal ke kaatne ki wajah se hai kyun ki hum NY mein camping gaye the. Phele legs and arms par dikhaya, red raised spot (bite jaise) se shuru hota hai, lekin jab aap isko scratch karte hain, toh aur reddish bumps appear, kabhi kabhi bahut jyada itchy hote hain, raat mein aur jyada, sone se rokte hai.
